name: SmallWorld LD 38: WorldDefenderDanceGuy
description:
A simple rhythm game made for ludum dare 38 jam.

The Mighty Head has spoken so now the fate of your "small world" lies in your blobby body. You must giggle your flaps to the beat in order to please the Head overlord or your planet is doomed.

Directions:

Use the arrow keys or wasd to change your color to match that of the falling tiles.

UP = RED

DOWN = BLUE

LEFT = GREEN

RIGHT = YELLOW
